name: KidzRobotics
0:
”Alexa, start Kids Robotics”
”Alexa, ask Kids Robotics about Science Fiction”
”Alexa, ask Kids Robotics about History”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kids robotics
des:
The skill introduces kids to Robots and Robotics with some basic information. 
The information is brief and introductory - our objective is to get kids interested in this fascinating subject and start learning more.
The information includes some ancient, medieval and modern history - science fiction - different uses of robots - and how they work. 
Just say Alexa, Open Kids Robotics to start a conversation. Or ask direct questions like 
- 'Alexa, ask Kids Robotics to talk about Asimov's laws.' etc.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
